statements: SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 'a1b2c3d4' AND status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transactions WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT MAX(amount) FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 'e5f6g7h8';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flag_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, user_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1234 AND transaction_type = 'refund';

SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN flagged_transactions ON transactions.transaction_id = flagged_transactions.transaction_id WHERE flagged_transactions.flag_status = TRUE ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users
SELECT full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, address FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, email FROM users WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT t.transaction_id, s.activity_description FROM transactions t JOIN suspicious_activities s ON t.transaction_id = s.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, generated_at FROM alerts WHERE is_read = false;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE is_read = false ORDER BY generated_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount, type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT username, role FROM users;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC, username ASC;
